S01kbavk93u:0: KAvk_93.1 ślāghyā jayanti jinabhaktiviśeṣabhājāṃ śraddhāsudhāprasaranirjharaśīkarās te /
S01kbavk93u:1: niścetano 'py ucitacetanatām ivaiti yaḥ pūjyapūjanavidhau kusumādivargaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:2: KAvk_93.2 śrāvastyāṃ vijanāsīnaṃ jinaṃ jetavane purā /
S01kbavk93u:5: bhagavan prauḍhim āyātā kanyā mama sumāgadhā //
S01kbavk93u:8: KAvk_93.5 kanyāṃ dadāmi tāṃ tasmai bhagavan yadi manyase /
S01kbavk93u:10: KAvk_93.6 ity ukte tena bhagavān vātsalyavimalāśayaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:11: ko doṣas tanayā tasmai dīyatām ity abhāṣata //
S01kbavk93u:12: KAvk_93.7 śāstuḥ śāsanam ādāya sādaraṃ pranipatya tam /
S01kbavk93u:14: KAvk_93.8 tataḥ sumāgadhāṃ kanyāṃ vibhavena mahīyasā /
S01kbavk93u:16: KAvk_93.9 dattā dūrataraṃ deśam atha yāntī sumāgadhā /
S01kbavk93u:18: KAvk_93.10 cireṇa sā samāsādya nagaraṃ puṇḍravardhanam /
S01kbavk93u:20: KAvk_93.ll kadācid atha tāṃ śvaśrūr bhojyasaṃbhārakāriṇī /
S01kbavk93u:22: KAvk_93.12 pūjyopakaraṇaṃ sajjaṃ kuru sarvaṃ sumāgadhe /
S01kbavk93u:23: gṛhān naḥ prātar āgantā jagatpūjyaguṇo jinaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:24: KAvk_93.l3 guravo gauravapadaṃ pūjyāḥ sarvajanasya te /
S01kbavk93u:26: KAvk_93.14 ity uktā sā tayā tatra babhūvārambhatatparā /
S01kbavk93u:28: KAvk_93.15 athāpare 'hni viviśur nagnāḥ kṣapaṇakā gṛham /
S01kbavk93u:30: KAvk_93.16 tān alajjān avasanān avalokya sumāgadhā /
S01kbavk93u:34: KAvk_93.18 aho vatāyam ācāraḥ sucirād avalokitaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:35: digambarāṇām apy agre yad ihāste vadhūjanaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:38: KAvk_93.20 asthāne bhavatāṃ bhaktiḥ ko 'yam ucchṛṅkhalaḥ kramaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:39: na tyaktam aśanaṃ yena sa kathaṃ vastram ujjhati //
S01kbavk93u:42: dambhārambhabhayaṃkare ca vadane krodhaḥ svayaṃ lakṣyate
S01kbavk93u:43: nagnānām aśanaiṣiṇāṃ niyaminām eṣāṃ paśūnām iva //
S01kbavk93u:44: KAvk_93.22 yatraite paśavaḥ pūjyās tatrotsāryā bhavanti ke /
S01kbavk93u:46: KAvk_93.23 iti bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ śvaśrūr viṣaṇṇā pratyabhāṣata /
S01kbavk93u:47: pitus te bhavane bhadre pūjyate vada kīdṛśaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:48: KAvk_93.24 sāvadan matpitur gehe pūjyate bhagavān jinaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:53: kāntyaivāsau kim api viduṣāṃ śāntim antas tanoti //
S01kbavk93u:59: niḥśeṣitasmṛtibhuvaḥ pramadāśrayasya rāgojjhitasya sutarām adharaḥ sarāgaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:61: kṣāntis tanmayakāriṇī hṛdi dayā gāḍhaṃ samāśleṣiṇī /
S01kbavk93u:64: KAvk_93.29 pūjyaḥ sa bhavane 'smākaṃ yasya pravrajyayā satām /
S01kbavk93u:68: KAvk_93.31 iti tasyā vacaḥ śvaśrūḥ śrutvā śrotrarasāyanam /
S01kbavk93u:70: KAvk_93.32 api taddarśanopāyaḥ kaścid asti varānane /
S01kbavk93u:72: KAvk_93.33 iti sānunayaṃ śvaśrvā sā sādaradhiyārthitā /
S01kbavk93u:76: KAvk_93.35 tataḥ prāsādam āruhya bhagavatsevitāṃ diśam /
S01kbavk93u:78: KAvk_93.36 puṣpadhūpodakair arcāṃ sā kṛtvā tatpadonmukhī /
S01kbavk93u:82: KAvk_93.38 tvatpādapadmayugalaṃ śaraṇam prapannāṃ dūrasthitām api dṛśā spṛśa māṃ dayālo /
S01kbavk93u:83: vātsalyapeśaladhiyāṃ mahatāṃ pravāsadurīkṛteṣu karuṇā na tanutvam eti //
S01kbavk93u:84: KAvk_93.39 bhagavan dāsasutayā tvaṃ mayādya nimantritaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:85: prātar āgamanenaiva mānaṃ vitara me vibho //
S01kbavk93u:88: KAvk_93.41 sā śvetaraktaharitāsitapuṣpapālī khe dhūpadhūmaśabalā śanakaiḥ prayāntī /
S01kbavk93u:90: KAvk_93.42 atha jetavanaṃ prāpya kṣaṇena kusumāvalī /
S01kbavk93u:92: KAvk_93.43 bhagavān api sarvajñaḥ sarvaṃ jñātvā samīhitam /
S01kbavk93u:94: KAvk_93.44 prātar gantavyam asmābhir nagaraṃ puṇḍravardhanam /
S01kbavk93u:96: KAvk_93.45 śataṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ tatra yojanānām itaḥ param /
S01kbavk93u:97: ekenāhnā ca gantavyaṃ na vilambo 'tra yujyate //
S01kbavk93u:98: KAvk_93.46 vyomnā maharddhyā śaknoti gantuṃ yo yaḥ prabhāvavān /
S01kbavk93u:100: KAvk_93.47 preritaḥ sugateneti sa bhikṣubhyo nyavedayat /
S01kbavk93u:102: KAvk_93.48 śalākāsu gṛhītāsu tatra sarvair maharddhibhiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:105: pāṇau prāha tam ānandaḥ kiṃcit smitasitānanaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:108: KAvk_93.5l ity uktaḥ sthaviras tena vailakṣyavinatānanaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:111: hantuṃ sapatnaiḥ śakyante prāptum ṛddhipadaṃ kiyat //
S01kbavk93u:112: KAvk_93.53 iti cintayatas tasya tīvrasaṃvegayā dhiyā /
S01kbavk93u:114: KAvk_93.54 atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ prabhāte sarvabhikṣavaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:122: KAvk_93.58 taṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṃkāśaṃ vismitāḥ śvaśurādayaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:123: ūcuḥ sumāgadhāṃ prītyā kim eṣa bhagavān iti //
S01kbavk93u:124: KAvk_93.59 sāvadad bhagavān nāyaṃ dṛśyate taraṇiprabhaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:127: kim ayaṃ kim ayaṃ bhadre bhagavān iti tāṃ jaguḥ //
S01kbavk93u:128: KAvk_93.6l sābravīn naiva śāstāyam ete tacchāsanocitāḥ /
S01kbavk93u:131: āścaryakṛn mūrta iva prabhāvaḥ śrīmān mahākāśyapa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:133: vyomnā samabhyeti gunaiḥ pragītaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣur bhuvi śāriputraḥ //
S01kbavk93u:134: KAvk_93.64 āruhya kailāsam ivātiśubhraṃ dvipam caturdantam anantakāntiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:135: āyāti yaḥ puṇyavatāṃ jagatsu maudgalyanāmā ca sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:137: upaiti yaḥ saurabhapūritāśaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ prathito 'niruddhaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:139: vigāhate sphitavanena bhikṣur maitrāyaṇīsūnur ayaṃ sa pūrṇaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:140: KAvk_93.67 anantam āsthāya nitāntaśāntam īrṣyāpathaṃ sattvamahodadhir yaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:141: prabhāmṛtaiḥ sarpati tarpitāśaḥ prabhāvavān eṣyajid eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:143: yaḥ puṇyapūrṇadyutir abhyupaiti sa eṣa bhikṣur matimān upālī //
S01kbavk93u:145: limpann ivāgacchati yaḥ prabhābhiḥ kātyāyano nāma sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:146: KAvk_93.70 śarīriṇaṃ dharmam ivādhiruhya vigāhate khaṃ vṛṣavāhano yaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:147: pṛṣṭhaḥ pratiṣṭhāpariniṣṭhitānāṃ gariṣṭhadhīḥ kauṣṭhila eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:148: KAvk_93.7l vimānahaṃsadyutibhir muhūrtaṃ smitormiramyaṃ muhur antarīkṣam /
S01kbavk93u:149: kurvan samabhyeti taponidhir yaḥ pilindavatsāhvaya eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
S01kbavk93u:151: sa śroṇakoṭiḥ śruta eṣa bhikṣur akṣuṇṇalakṣmīr gṛhanirvyapekṣaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:152: KAvk_93.73 yaś cakravartī divi bhāti so 'yaṃ śāstuḥ suto rāhulakābhidhānaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:154: KAvk_93.74 ete giribhyo 'tha digantarebhyaḥ kṣmāmaṇḍalād vyomataṭāntarāc ca /
S01kbavk93u:156: KAvk_93.75 tayā krameṇeti nivedyamānaṃ te bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vimukhaṃ vilokya /
S01kbavk93u:162: KAvk_93.78 aṣṭādaśadvārapathā puraṃ tat sa tulyam aṣṭādaśamūrtir eva /
S01kbavk93u:164: KAvk_93.79 abhyarcitas tatra bahuprakāraiḥ pūrṇopacāraiḥ praṇipatya sarvaiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:165: apūjayat paurajanaḥ samantād bahiś ca bhittipratibimbitaṃ tam //
S01kbavk93u:166: KAvk_93.80 sumāgadhāyā dayayā dayāluḥ pūjāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavān sasaṃghaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:168: KAvk_93.81 sumāgadhā saśvaśurādivargā sahāparaiḥ paurajanaiś ca sarvāḥ /
S01kbavk93u:169: śāstus tayā deśanayā babhūvuḥ śuddhāśayās tatkṣaṇadṛṣṭasatyāḥ //
S01kbavk93u:170: KAvk_93.82 sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalānubandhaṃ puṇyaṃ prabhāvaṃ vipulaṃ vilokya /
S01kbavk93u:171: te bhikṣavas tatra kutūhalena papracchū ramyaṃ jinam ādivṛttam //
S01kbavk93u:172: KAvk_93.83 pṛṣṭaḥ sa taiḥ saṃsadi sarvadarśī sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalasya hetum /
S01kbavk93u:173: dantaprabhābhiḥ kakubhāṃ mukheṣu diśan prakāśam bhagavān babhāṣe //
S01kbavk93u:174: KAvk_93.84 vārāṇasyām abhūt pūrvaṃ kṛkeḥ kantasya bhūpateḥ /
S01kbavk93u:176: KAvk_93.85 kāśyapākhyasya śāstuḥ sā satataṃ bhaktiśālinī /
S01kbavk93u:177: paricaryāṃ vyadhāt sārdhaṃ sakhīnāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ //
S01kbavk93u:180: KAvk_93.87 te taṃ rājasutādveṣān nimittajñā babhāṣire /
S01kbavk93u:182: KAvk_93.88 iti teṣām anādṛtya vacaḥ krūrataraṃ nṛpaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:183: bhagavantaṃ yayau draṣṭuṃ kāśyapaṃ duhitur girā //
S01kbavk93u:184: KAvk_93.89 sa tam etyāvadat svapnaḥ savikāraḥ paraṃ mayā /
S01kbavk93u:185: dṛṣṭo 'dya sarvaṃ sarvajña tatphalaṃ vaktum arhasi //
S01kbavk93u:186: KAvk_93.90 vātāyanena nirgacchan ruddhapuccho mayā gajaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:187: tṛṣitasya tathā paścāt kupo dhāvan vilokitaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:192: KAvk_93.93 sphītarājyām abhiṣiktaś ca kucāpalanidhiḥ kapiḥ /
S01kbavk93u:196: KAvk_93.95 svapnādbhutānām eteṣāṃ manye ghorataraṃ phalam /
S01kbavk93u:198: KAvk_93.96 śatāyuṣi jane śāstā śāntaḥ śākyamunir jinaḥ /
S01kbavk93u:199: bhaviṣyaty amṛtāmbhodhiḥ sa drṣṭaḥ kuñjaras tvayā //
S01kbavk93u:200: KAvk_93.97 tasyāpi paścime kāle śrāvakāḥ kalisaṃśrayāt /
S01kbavk93u:203: svayaṃ sevāṃ samālambya kariṣyanty eva deśanām //
S01kbavk93u:205: tṛṣitasya vrajan paścāt kūpas tasmād vilokitaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:206: KAvk_93.lOO te kariṣyanti lobhāndhaḥ saṃmohopahatāḥ param /
S01kbavk93u:210: KAvk_93.102 kvacid bhadraṃ samāsādya vinītaṃ bhikṣukuñjaram /
S01kbavk93u:214: KAvk_93.104 ṣaṇḍakasyābhiṣekaś ca bhaviṣyati kaper iva /
S01kbavk93u:218: KAvk_93.106 tava svapnavipākānte phalāny etāni bhūtale /
S01kbavk93u:219: iti śāstur vacaḥ śrutvā vismito 'bhūn mahīpatiḥ //
S01kbavk93u:220: KAvk_93.l07 sānugasyātha nṛpateḥ sa śāstā dharmadeśanām /
S01kbavk93u:226: KAvk_93.ll0 adhidhāyeti bhagavān nabhasā bhikṣubhiḥ saha /
S01kbavk93u:227: rucā saṃpūrayann āśāṃ yayau jetavanaṃ jinaḥ //
S01kbavk93u:229: sūnuś ced aguṇas tad eva viphalaṃ tat kiṃ na sarvaṃ kulam /
S01kbavk93u:230: sā kanyā kila jāyate guṇavatī puṇyaprabhāvād yayā
S01kbavk93u:232: iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ sumāgadhāvadānaṃ trinavatitamaḥ pallavah.
